nodes.documentation:
@dev resolves a challenge for the provided _propID. It must be checked in advance whether the _propID has a challenge on it
@param _propID the proposal ID whose challenge is to be resolved.
nodes.name: resolveChallenge
set

params._propID: The proposal ID for which to determine whether its application stage passed without a challenge
The proposal ID whose challenge to inspect

params._challengeID: The challengeID to determine a reward for
the challenge ID to claim tokens for

claimRewards(uint256[]).details: Called by a voter to claim their rewards for each completed vote. Someone must call updateStatus() before this can be called.

params._challengeIDs: The PLCR pollIDs of the challenges rewards are being claimed for

params._name: the key whose value is to be determined

params._propID: the proposal ID to make a determination and state transition for
The proposal ID whose existance is to be determined

params._name: the name of the proposed param to be set
params._value: the proposed value to set the param to be set

params._voter: The voter whose claim status to query for the provided challengeID

voterReward(address,uint256).details: Calculates the provided voter's token reward for the given poll.

params._challengeID: The ID of the challenge the voter's reward is being calculated for
params._voter: The address of the voter whose reward balance is to be returned

voterReward(address,uint256).return: The uint indicating the voter's reward

canBeSet(bytes32).notice: Determines whether a proposal passed its application stage without a challenge

challengeCanBeResolved(bytes32).notice: Determines whether the provided proposal ID has a challenge which can be resolved

challengeReparameterization(bytes32).notice: challenge the provided proposal ID, and put tokens at stake to do so.

challengeWinnerReward(uint256).notice: Determines the number of tokens to awarded to the winning party in a challenge

claimReward(uint256).notice: Claim the tokens owed for the msg.sender in the provided challenge

get(string).notice: gets the parameter keyed by the provided name value from the params mapping

processProposal(bytes32).notice: for the provided proposal ID, set it, resolve its challenge, or delete it depending on whether it can be set, has a challenge which can be resolved, or if its "process by" date has passed

propExists(bytes32).notice: Determines whether a proposal exists for the provided proposal ID

proposeReparameterization(string,uint256.notice: propose a reparamaterization of the key _name's value to _value.
